alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:31PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sheridan County through 1030 PM MDT... At 931 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port Of Raymond, or 16 miles north of Plentywood, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Westby, Port Of Raymond, Comertown, Raymond, Dooley and Coalridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northeastern Montana.
